display_long_description:
VR Werewolf Game
You wake on a mysterious island where day and night alternate, and each moment is filled with challenges. During the sunny days, players transform into clever explorers, completing various mini-tasks to accumulate favor for their respective factions. This is the time to demonstrate your strategic and cooperative skills, as each choice may influence your fate.

When night falls, the game enters its intense second half. Players are assigned to different factions by a mysterious force, and each faction has its unique missions. Your tasks may be secret or public, but the key is to complete them in order to secure victory. But don't forget, danger may lurk in the darkness, so always stay alert and protect yourself!

Tour Mode
While waiting for other players to join the Werewolf party, why not jump into our level mode to make your wait fun and challenging! Currently, we have two fantastic maps for you to explore: the Candleland filled with ghosts and the Mushroom Kingdom with giant mushrooms. Becoming a brave adventurer, using your jumping skills, carrying ladders, and other ingenious means to navigate through various meticulously designed levels.

At the same time, don’t forget to collect those shiny coins during your adventure; they can be used to participate in lotteries, winning accessories and items, and there are also Revival Stars for you to collect. Use them to exchange for unique special accessories and furniture, making your gaming experience even more enjoyable
